snippet: Journalists at The Las Vegas Review-Journal are complaining about the lack of transparency of the newspaper’s new mystery owner.
abstract: Journalists at Las Vegas Review-Journal try to find out who bought newspaper for $140 million; complain of lack of transparency; purchase was conducted by entity called News + Media Capital Group LLC, but it remains unclear who is behind company.

byline.contributor: Sydney Ember and Susan C. Beachy contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Journalists at The Las Vegas Review-Journal are complaining about the lack of transparency of the newspaper’s new mystery owner.

headline.main: Reporters in Las Vegas Try to Crack Case of Who Owns Their Newspaper
headline.print_headline: Reporters in Las Vegas Try to Crack Case of Who Really Owns Their Newspaper
